languages.text: "Худо выглядите, шерин. Вот, попейте водички. И не переживайте, я с удовольствием сыграю с вами вновь, еще отыграетесь! А сейчас вам лучше отдохнуть. И, Великим молю, не засыпайте в купальне".

"Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."
languages.original_text: "Худо выглядите, шерин. Вот, попейте водички. И не переживайте, я с удовольствием сыграю с вами вновь, еще отыграетесь! А сейчас вам лучше отдохнуть. И, Великим молю, не засыпайте в купальне".

traits.locale_text: "You do not look so good, shereen. Here, have some water. Worry not, I will gladly play another round with you so that you can get payback! Right now, though, you should catch some rest. And, for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You do not look so good, shereen. Here, have some water. Worry not, I will gladly play another round with you so that you can get payback! Right now, though, you should catch some rest. And, for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Tout va bien, shereen ? Tenez, buvez un peu d'eau. Ne vous inquiétez pas ! Je me ferai un plaisir de rejouer avec vous plus tard si vous voulez essayer de prendre votre revanche, mais pour le moment, vous feriez mieux de vous reposer. Oh... et pour l'amour de l'Exalté, ne vous endormez pas dans la baignoire. »
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."

traits.locale_text: « Tout va bien, shereen ? Tenez, buvez un peu d'eau. Ne vous inquiétez pas ! Je me ferai un plaisir de rejouer avec vous plus tard si vous voulez essayer de prendre votre revanche, mais pour le moment, vous feriez mieux de vous reposer. Oh... et pour l'amour de l'Exalté, ne vous endormez pas dans la baignoire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Está bien, shereen? Tome, agua. ¡No se preocupe! Podemos echar otra más tarde si quiere la revancha. Por ahora, debería descansar. Oh... y por el amor del Exaltado, no se duerma en la bañera».
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."

traits.locale_text: «¿Está bien, shereen? Tome, agua. ¡No se preocupe! Podemos echar otra más tarde si quiere la revancha. Por ahora, debería descansar. Oh... y por el amor del Exaltado, no se duerma en la bañera».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你还好吗，亲爱的？来，喝点水吧。别担心！如果你打算扳平比分的话，我很愿意和你重赛一轮。不过现在，你应该好好休息一下才对。噢……看在至高无上的神皇份上，你千万别在浴缸里睡着了。”
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."

traits.locale_text: “你还好吗，亲爱的？来，喝点水吧。别担心！如果你打算扳平比分的话，我很愿意和你重赛一轮。不过现在，你应该好好休息一下才对。噢……看在至高无上的神皇份上，你千万别在浴缸里睡着了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「大丈夫か、シェリーン？ほら、水を飲むといい。心配しないで！スコアを同点にしたいなら、またあとでもう１ラウンド遊んであげるよ。でも今は、休むべきだ。あと…エグザルテッド・ワンへの為にも、バスタブで眠るのはよしてくれよ」
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."

traits.locale_text: 「大丈夫か、シャリーン？ほら、水を飲むといい。心配しないで！スコアを同点にしたいなら、またあとでもう１ラウンド遊んであげるよ。でも今は、休むべきだ。あと…エグザルテッド・ワンへの為にも、バスタブで眠るのはよしてくれよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Geht es Euch gut, Shereen? Hier, trinkt mal einen Schluck Wasser. Keine Sorge! Ich spiele gerne später noch eine Runde mit Euch, wenn Ihr auf eine Revanche brennt. Aber erst einmal solltet Ihr Euch ausruhen, denke ich. Ach ... und beim Erhabenen, schlaft bloß nicht in der Badewanne ein."
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."

traits.locale_text: "Geht es Euch gut, Shereen? Hier, trinkt mal einen Schluck Wasser. Keine Sorge! Ich spiele gerne später noch eine Runde mit Euch, wenn Ihr auf eine Revanche brennt. Aber erst einmal solltet Ihr Euch ausruhen, denke ich. Ach ... und beim Erhabenen, schlaft bloß nicht in der Badewanne ein."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İyi misin şirinim? Al, biraz su iç. Merak etme! Daha sonra rövanş yapıp skoru eşitlemek istersen bir tur daha seve seve oynarım. Fakat şimdilik biraz dinlensen iyi olur gibi. Ha... Bu arada Görkemli aşkına, sakın küvette uyuyakalma."
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, shereen? Here, have some water. Do not worry! I will gladly play another round with you later if you want to try and even the score. Right now though, you should get some rest. Oh... and for the love of the Exalted One, do not fall asleep in the bathtub."
